title: Bikerumor Pic Of the Day: Paris, France
content:
Photo submitted by Nocolas Gabriel of their Specialized Diverge seemingly suspended in mid-air on work created by street artist Jr on the Place du Trocadéro in Paris. “L’artiste street art Jr a conçu une nouvelle œuvre qui joue avec notre œil. Visible depuis le mercredi 19 mai, son anamorphose est située sur la place du […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of the Day: Paris, France appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
